players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Charlie was killed by the mafia. We need to figure out who is working against us."
You: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night and he's been trying to deceive us. We should vote him out."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's vote for Bob."
Bob: "I have nothing to hide. I was just as shocked as everyone when Charlie was found dead last night. Let's focus on finding the real killer and not make hasty accusations."
